text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon ʙigu] «Ojo [sazost, ki ʙaroi qazovat dar ʙorai ixtilofi manu sumo] dovare cuz Alloh taolo ʙicuem? Va hol on ki Ust, ki in kitoʙro ʙo tafsil ʙa suji sumo nozil kardaast».Va onho, ki kitoʙ [-i osmoni] ʙa eson dodaem, medonand, ki on [Qur'on] az coniʙi Parvardigorat ʙa haq nozil sudaast.Pas, hargiz az tardidkunandagon naʙos
